name: ChernoBill!
description:
This game made for Global Game Jam 2020 (main page)

Description: Co-op 3D funny game!

Credits: 
- Programers: Mohammad Moqaddam(lead), Amirhosein Rafighi
- 3D Character design\animation: Mohammad Jahangiri

- Level design\modeling: Amin Montazeri
- UI, SFX and graphic design: Amin Montazeri  


*Assets used:
DoozyUI
PlayMaker
Camera filter pack

*Music: "Sursike Funk" from AudioJungle
